ValidationRule.description: Ensures that it is not possible to confirm the death on creation of the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && ISNEW() && RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Deceased' && ( NOT(ISBLANK( DateDeathConfirmed__c )) || NOT(ISPICKVAL( DeathCertificateReceived__c, "")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: On creation of a deceased case, you cannot confirm the date of death or how the death certificate was received. Please save and this can be added after.
